desc: The official Moomin UK online shop. Explore the biggest selection of official Moomin products available in the UK.

layout.text: Moomin by Arabia x Red Cross

This new charity collection by Arabia and The Red Cross is a celebration of friendship and kindness! As part of the campaign, people are encouraged to perform small acts of kindness for one another all around the world.
The new collection will launch on the 9th of August, 2022.
